channel.title: Torino, May 28-29 2016, Torino Synth Meeting
channel.description:
Torino Synth Meeting (www.synthmeeting.com) is the only Italian event about synthesizers and electronic music instrument.
The 6th edition will be held on 28 and 29 May 2016 Confirmed brand Access, Apogee, Arturia, Dave Smith Instruments, Elektron, Euterpe Synthesizers lab, Frap Tools, Grp Synthesizers, Jomox, M-audio. Moog music, Non linear labs, Novation, Patchblocks, Radikal technologies, Roland, Waldorf, Yamaha and many others is coming!
our fb event https://www.facebook.com/events/1045478648869462/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jqsL2JPouDQ
FREE ENTRANCE!!
